settings.review: I’ve always been wary of conventional skin care products due to their long list of unrecognizable ingredients. I feel very fortunate to have found this product. Thank you for bringing it to market!
settings.name: Michele M.

settings.review: Omg my dull, dry, and broken out skin from fertility meds is so happy now. I barely have to wear makeup and someone thought I was 19 and SHOCKED when I mentioned my age and that I was married and a mom. I am a customer for life!
settings.name: Brittany N.

settings.review: Amazing customer service and even better product. Skin has never been better and I don't have to worry about harmful chemicals.
settings.name: Lee K.

settings.title: Written in Radiance
settings.content: See how Super Tallow™ is redefining skincare, one glowing transformation at a time.

settings.title: A Journey to a Cleaner, Non-toxic Lifestyle
settings.subtitle: Our Story
settings.content: Stacie spent years in the modeling world, where she was surrounded by mainstream skincare that eventually led to stubborn breakouts in her twenties. Frustrated, she dug deep and discovered the wonders of pure, non-toxic beef tallow. It was a game changer. Soon, she had her husband, Slater a lifelong surfer from Hawaii just as hooked on tallow’s magic for his skin. When their best friend Tyler, who had spent years behind the scenes helping build other beauty brands, joined forces with them, everything clicked. Together, they set out to build a skincare brand rooted in truth and simplicity—because they were tired of hidden toxic ingredients in most skincare. That’s how Clae was born; a brand committed to honesty, transparency, and the belief that the best skincare is skincare simplified.
